comments:
JVEWRKB02:

Create a new Java Project
Create a new Visual Class extending JPanel in it.
With the Visual Editor with the JPanel open, select the project and
Refactor->Rename it.
The refactoring will have an error, and Eclipse will be locked (crashed).

The same refactoring error comes up if you have a normal Java file open, but it
doesn't crash Eclipse.

This shows up in .log:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 4 May 26, 2004 10:21:48.959
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while moving resources.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 May 26, 2004 10:21:48.959
!MESSAGE Copy successful, but problems occurred removing old resources
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 May 26, 2004 10:21:48.959
!MESSAGE Could not delete: D:\workspaces\runtime-V6\test11.
Not sure but maybe has something to do we the VM refresh problem.

This problem still occurs although it does not hand Eclipse.
But it comes up with an error dialog with the options to abort or undo. The
details have the message: 
Problems encountered while moving resources.
  Copy successful, but problems occurred removing old resources
    Could not delete: D:\workspaces\target-ve-eclipse-RC2\VE Swing.
"VE Swing" is the old name. If you choose either one the JPanel re-displays
correctly on the graph viewer. Closing and reopening the JPanel works okay.
If you choose Undo, The JPanel shows again but if you close and reopen the VE,
it throws a NPE and comes up with an empty gray canvas. Close/reopen will then
work every other time with NPE's in between. 

Here's the stack trace for the rename:
!SESSION Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.17 ----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=unknown
java.version=1.4.2_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 4 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.17
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while moving resources.
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.27
!MESSAGE Copy successful, but problems occurred removing old resources
!SUBENTRY 3 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.27
!MESSAGE Could not delete: D:\workspaces\target-ve-eclipse-RC2\VE Swing.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 4 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.47
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while moving resources.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.47
!MESSAGE Copy successful, but problems occurred removing old resources
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.47

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.beaninfo 2 0 Jun 16, 2004 14:44:22.648
!MESSAGE 
+++ Warning +++: Wed Jun 16 14:44:22 EDT 2004    Build job waiting when trying
to start beaninfo registry. Possible race.

This shouldn't occur. The problem is that we are not listening for the
pre-delete. So this locks the project folder (thru the remote vm's class
loaders). So it can't be physically deleted.

Need to change to listen to the pre-delete so that we can release the registry
before the delete actually occurs. (Note a rename is really a delete/add).
This has been released to HEAD.
1.0M2 is out, so these are now closed in M2.
